    • getTraining

      public Optional<User> getTraining(Long trainingId)
      Description copied from interface: TrainingProvider
      Retrieves a training based on their ID. If the user with given ID is not found, then Optional.empty() will be returned.
      Specified by:
      getTraining in interface TrainingProvider
      Parameters:
      trainingId - id of the training to be searched
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the located Training, or Optional.empty() if not found
